intro: Tilia × carlsruhensis, commonly known as the Carlsruhe lime, is a hybrid deciduous tree belonging to the Tiliaceae family. It is characterized by its heart-shaped leaves that are typically light green on top and paler underneath. The tree produces small, yellowish-green flowers in clusters, which appear in early summer.
